Text:
For those interested in this information:
This file has been Pre-Screened to be Free of "Gross Pixelation Errors"
XVID posted

The record this season is 4 damaged and 3 perfect (including this one)

AVIGUY

The one cool thing about RAR files is that if your P2P client allows it, you can download the RARs in order and then "keep broken files" and you can start watching a lot sooner - it's just a lot of work.
